extension.name: Content - Automatic Sub Menu Magic - by Bincom
extension.author: Bade Adesemowo
extension.description:
This Plugin automatically creates a new Joomla Menu or Submenu when an article is created.

How it works:

For Menu : it creates a new menu item for new articles that are in a category with the exact name of the menu .
i.e "articles created in category = Main Menu" will create menuitems under the Main Menu .

For Sub Menu: It creates a sub menu with the title of the article under a parent menu with the same name as the articles' category.
i.e "Articles stored in a category "About Us" will create new Sub Menu under the Menu item "About Us" that may be in any Menu .

Based on an plugin by DeRose Technologies, Inc.(http://www.derosetechnologies.com/community/joomla-automatic-menu-magic), Bade Adesemowo of Bincom extended this plugin to enable submenus of menu items to be created as well as in the mainmenu too. Automatically creates/updates joomla menu items, when an article's category matches a menu's name.

Note:
1. You only need this plugin if you want to create auto magic sub menu . You should use the original if you do not need Sub Menus. Publishing the 2 plugin will cause duplicate menu items.
2. If you want to enable auto deletion of Menu items when article is deleted, you need to install the second half of this extension system plugin : automenu_magic_system-1.00.zip . This is available here : http://www.derosetechnologies.com/community/joomla-automatic-menu-magic (no modification was done to the system plugin)

History: BADEsemowo modified this extension to suit a client project in November 2009. Another client project needed it in July 2010 so I decided to publish it to joomla incase anyone needs it. Most of the work was done by the original author at Derose technologies. I only modified the code to enable creation of menus as a submenu of meneu items.

field.name: carryoutonmenuwithname
field.label: Carry out on Menu with name :
field.description: Use the function on only the menu in the above named . Use 'all' withouth the quote to operate on all menus

field.name: menutype_title_matches
field.label: Create where title matches
field.description: This regex is passed to mysql when matching menutypes against an article's category. This string is passed through sprintf on its way to mysql - use %s to indicate the location of the category substitution.

field.name: menuitem_param_defaults
field.label: Item Param defaults
field.description: A comma separated list of key=value formatted pairs. These values will be used when auto-creating menuitems.

field.name: associate_modules_with_items
field.label: Associate modules with items?
field.description: Associate new menuitems, with ther modules from item order 0 of its corresponding menu.

field.name: create_menulinks_in
field.label: Also create menualias in
field.description: (Optional) A menutype, in which aliases should be made to a recently created menu item. For any menuitems in this menutype, which match menulinks_title_matches, a link will be created.

field.name: menulinks_title_matches
field.label: Create menualias when name matches against
field.description: This regex is passed to mysql when matching menuitems against an article's category. This string is passed through sprintf on its way to mysql - use %s to indicate the location of the category substitution. If no create_menulinks_in has been specified, then this value has no effect.

field.name: associate_modules_with_aliases
field.label: Associate modules with Aliases?
field.description: Associate new menualiases, with modules from its parent menu. This only takes effect when create_menulinks_in is set
